page.title: 06VILLAGE ACTIVITIES
page.content: {SECOND CRANWELL CUB SCOUTS There are only 10 cubs in our pack, but we still have a good time. Our "hut" is the old school, which is also used to house the play group. {THIRD CRANWELL BROWNIES There are 16 of us, and we also use the old school as our meeting place. We enjoy working hard to earn our badges. {PLAY GROUP Children who are not yet old enough to attend Primary School may join the playgroup in the village. They enjoy pre-school activities such as painting, listening to stories, and singing.
